text: fants, signs or symptoms of LCH that affects the skin may include:            -  Flaking of the scalp that may look like cradle cap.     - Raised, brown or purple skin rash anywhere on the body.            In children and adults, signs or symptoms of LCH that affects the skin and nails may include:            -  Flaking of the scalp that may look like dandruff.     -  Raised, red or brown, crusted rash in the groin area, abdomen, back, or chest, that may be itchy.     - Bumps or ulcers on the sc
